column4: on my feisty server box, i have a full hard drive.  after running 'du -hx' i found i have a 36GB file called '.'  any idea how to erase that or why it happened?
on my feisty server box, i have a full hard drive.  after running 'du -hx' i found i have a 36GB file called '.'  any idea how to erase that or why it happened?
that's the total for the directory you are in when you ran du -hx
all directories in that output list the size of all files under it
